trans-unit.source: Holds the stack of server channel sinks.
trans-unit.target: 包含服务器信道接收器的堆栈。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand.
trans-unit.target: 此类，使链接要求。

trans-unit.source: A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接调用方没有基础结构的权限，则会引发一个安全异常。

trans-unit.source: See [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[链接需求](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ServerChannelSinkStack"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ServerChannelSinkStack"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Requests asynchronous processing of a method call on the sinks in the current sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 在当前的接收器堆栈中接收器调用异步方法的处理的请求。

trans-unit.source: This method initializes asynchronous processing on the top sink in the current sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会初始化当前的接收器堆栈的顶部接收器上的异步处理。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关其他信息，请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>方法。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message to be serialized onto the requested stream.
trans-unit.target: 要进行序列化到所请求的流的消息。

trans-unit.source: The headers retrieved from the server response stream.
trans-unit.target: 从服务器响应流中检索标头。

trans-unit.source: The stream coming back from the transport sink.
trans-unit.target: 返回的流从传输接收器。

trans-unit.source: The current sink stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: 当前的接收器堆栈为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.IO.Stream> onto which the specified message is to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.IO.Stream>指定的消息进行序列化到其上。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: This method returns the stream returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.GetResponseStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName> called with the `msg` and `headers` parameters (<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.GetResponseStream%2A> (`msg`, `headers`)) on the top sink in the current sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过返回的流<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.GetResponseStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName>使用调用`msg`和`headers`参数 (<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.GetResponseStream%2A> (`msg`， `headers`)) 上当前的接收器堆栈的顶部接收器。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.GetResponseStream%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.GetResponseStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The top sink in the sink stack remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 接收器堆栈的顶部接收器保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The message to be serialized onto the requested stream.
trans-unit.target: 要进行序列化到所请求的流的消息。

trans-unit.source: The headers retrieved from the server response stream.
trans-unit.target: 从服务器响应流中检索标头。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> onto which the specified message is to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>指定的消息进行序列化到其上。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The sink stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: 接收器堆栈为空。

trans-unit.source: Pops the information associated with all the sinks from the sink stack up to and including the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 弹出达与从接收器堆栈的所有接收器关联和包括指定的接收器的信息。

trans-unit.source: The sink to remove and return from the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除并返回从接收器堆栈接收器。

trans-unit.source: Information generated on the request side and associated with the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 请求端上生成并与指定的接收器相关联的信息。

trans-unit.source: The current sink stack is empty, or the specified sink was never pushed onto the current stack.
trans-unit.target: 当前的接收器堆栈为空，或指定的接收器永远不会被推送到当前堆栈上。

trans-unit.source: Pushes the specified sink and information associated with it onto the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的接收器和与它关联到接收器堆栈信息的推送。

trans-unit.source: The information generated on the request side and specified in the `state` parameter is returned in the `state` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> method on the corresponding sink.
trans-unit.target: 信息请求端上生成并中指定`state`参数中返回`state`参数<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>相应接收器上的方法。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sink to push onto the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 要推送到接收器堆栈接收器。

trans-unit.source: Information generated on the request side that is needed on the response side.
trans-unit.target: 在响应端需要的请求端上生成的信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate to handle a callback after a message has been dispatched asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委托来处理回调后以异步方式调度消息。</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: The dispatched message represents a request method call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 调度的消息表示远程对象上的请求方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The ServerCallback method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: ServerCallback 方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。

trans-unit.source: You should not call it directly.
trans-unit.target: 你应不直接调用它。

trans-unit.source: The status and state of an asynchronous operation on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 状态和对远程对象的异步操作的状态。

trans-unit.source: Stores a message sink and its associated state for later asynchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 存储消息接收器和更高版本的异步处理其关联的状态。

trans-unit.source: The Store method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 应用商店方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。

trans-unit.source: You should not call it directly.
trans-unit.target: 你应不直接调用它。

trans-unit.source: A server channel sink.
trans-unit.target: 服务器信道接收器。

trans-unit.source: The state associated with `sink`.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的状态`sink`。

trans-unit.source: The current sink stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: 当前的接收器堆栈为空。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified sink was never pushed onto the current stack.
trans-unit.target: -或者-指定的接收器永远不会被推送到当前堆栈上。

trans-unit.source: Stores a message sink and its associated state, and then dispatches a message asynchronously, using the sink just stored and any other stored sinks.
trans-unit.target: 存储消息接收器和其关联的状态，并且随后将调度消息以异步方式，使用刚刚存储的接收器和任何其他存储的接收器。

trans-unit.source: The StoreAndDispatch method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: StoreAndDispatch 方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。

trans-unit.source: You should not call it directly.
trans-unit.target: 你应不直接调用它。

trans-unit.source: The method should be only called by a transport sink to complete an asynchronous dispatch.
trans-unit.target: 该方法应只调用由传输接收器以完成异步调度。

trans-unit.source: A server channel sink.
trans-unit.target: 服务器信道接收器。

trans-unit.source: The state associated with `sink`.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的状态`sink`。
